description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Come and enjoy New York while staying in a spacious and quiet apartment, right next to Fort Tryon Park!

5 min walking to both A and 1 trains: express trains to downtown (only 30 min).
Convenience store as well as cheap parking ($12/day) at 1 block.

Some bars and restaurants on Broadway.

You will have the entire apartment.
name: Modern & spacious 1BR on Manhattan, A & 1 lines
review: This is a real gem in NYC.  Although not centrally located it is so close to 2 subway stations, one the express train to midtown and the other the local you can go anywhere on public transpotation.  We were in the city for 5 days and bought 2 unlimited subway/bus passes for a week and it was $62.00  One cab ride would have been that much.  Great place and soooo quiet and safe.  Make sure you get the entry code to get into the building.  And parking around the corner on 192nd Street is reasonable.
